data.comment: The match has started at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Free kick Lille.
Lille have a dangerous throw-in.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
In the minute 3, At Stade Pierre Mauroy, Marcelo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Lilleâ€™s Burak Yilmaz is on his feet again at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Burak Yilmaz for Lille who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Lyon at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Free kick for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in Lyon.
Lille have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Lille in the half of Lyon.
In the minute 10, Can Lille capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lyon's half?
Throw-in for Lille close to the penalty box.
Karl Toko Ekambi (Lyon) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
Goal kick for Lyon at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 14, Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Houssem Aouar (Lyon) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Mikael Lesage awards Lille a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Lille take a 1-0 lead thanks to Jonathan Bamba.
Burak Yilmaz with an assist there.
Lille pushes forward through Jonathan Ikone, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Lille's Burak Yilmaz is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Lille.
Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick in a good position for Lyon!
In the minute 28, Jose Fonte (Lille) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 31, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
In Lille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Lyon's Karl Toko Ekambi has been booked in Lille.
In the minute 34, Mikael Lesage awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Jonathan Bamba for Lille gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lille.
Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
Burak Yilmaz is booked for the home team.
In the minute 41, Own goal in Lille! Zeki Celik scores in his own net to make it 1-1.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lille have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Lille.
Jose Fonte is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Jose Fonte, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Adama Soumaoro is the substitute for Lille.
The second half has started at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Mikael Lesage awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 47, Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
Throw-in Lille.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Lyon at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mikael Lesage awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Red card in Lille! Marcelo has been shown a second yellow card by Mikael Lesage.
Renato Sanches of Lille gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 51, Goal kick for Lyon at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Lyon to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
Rudi Garcia is making the team's first substitution at Stade Pierre Mauroy with Djamel Benlamri replacing Houssem Aouar.
In the minute 53, Throw-in Lille.
Mikael Lesage signals a throw-in for Lille, close to Lyon's area.
Mikael Lesage signals a Lille throw-in in Lyon's half.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Lille.
Lille drives forward and Jonathan Bamba gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in high up the field for Lyon in Lille.
In the minute 56, Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Lille.
In the minute 61, Jonathan Bamba of Lille smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Lyon at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Lille's Luiz Araujo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lille.
Free kick for Lyon in the half of Lille.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Lille in the half of Lyon.
The home team have replaced Jonathan Ikone with Yusuf Yazici. This is the second substitution made today by Christophe Galtier.
Corner awarded to Lille.
Corner awarded to Lille.
In the minute 69, Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, Lille's Yusuf Yazici is on target but unsuccessful.
Lille's Yusuf Yazici gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lyon defender.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
In the minute 74, Bruno Guimaraes is on a sub for Karl Toko Ekambi for Lyon.
Rudi Garcia (Lyon) is making a third substitution, with Moussa Dembele replacing Memphis Depay.
In the minute 76, Lille have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Mikael Lesage awards Lyon a goal kick.
Mikael Lesage signals a Lille throw-in in Lyon's half.
In the minute 78, Lyon needs to be cautious. Lille have an attacking throw-in.
Lyon have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Lille.
In the minute 80, Lille have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Lille to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 82, Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Lille to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
In Lille Lille attack through Renato Sanches. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 84, Mikael Lesage awards Lyon a goal kick.
Mikael Lesage signals a throw-in for Lille, close to Lyon's area.
Lille push forward at Stade Pierre Mauroy and Yusuf Yazici gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lyon defence.
In the minute 86, Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 89, Adama Soumaoro (Lille) gets a yellow card.
Jonathan David is replacing Luiz Araujo for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Isaac Lihadji is replacing Jonathan Bamba for the home team.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
Lille have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Goal kick for Lyon at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Lille.
Lille have a dangerous throw-in.
Lille's Yusuf Yazici breaks free at Stade Pierre Mauroy. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
